page_content:
CNN Example
•How many parameter will be needed if Fully Connected layer used instead of 
first convolutional layer?
•Input = 100 x 100 x 3 = 30,000
•The convolutional layer consists of 200 3x3 Filter so, 3 x 3 x 3 x 200 = 5400 
neurons will be needed
•Total No. of Parameter for Neural Network Layer  = N x M + M
= 30,000 x 5400 + 5400 = 162,005,400
